Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi xšnūmaine tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe tā āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe az aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi tā ō ī aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe dō bār guftan ka xšnūman nē srōš bēd ān ī bēd wizārdan agar ahlawān bēd auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō abāyēd guftan

"At aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi xšnūmaine tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe until āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe. They should from aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi until aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe twice. If it is not the šnūman for Srōš, they should utter the corresponding one. If it is (a liturgy) for the ahlawān, they must recite auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō..."
